name: Rolling Rampage
description:
Just a silly little game I made for the 24th Score Space Jam, don't take it too seriously and just have fun! 

The highscore is updated every second death.

If you play on web, make sure to fullscreen the game.

The lore:

You are a soldier who fought hard in a war but took a nasty injury that disabled you from fighting, you also couldn't afford a wheel chair so had to buy an office chair. Whenever you close your eyes though, all the memories start flooding back, maybe just a bit distorted though...

How  the theme of Evolve is used:

The enemies will evolve to get more challenging against the player. The cameras also evolve with the player.

Controls will take some getting used to at first, but just don't hover the mouse over the player and over a few minutes the controls should set in.

Assets I used that I didn't make (For Jam rules):

https://ambientcg.com/list for the ground and background.

Soldier: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/humans/lowpoly-sol...

Chair: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/furniture/colorable-office-chair-...
